casebody.data:
POMPANO MASONRY CORP.
v.
HDR ARCH. No. 450PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2004. Robert C. Bowers, George V. Hanna, III, Charlotte, for HDR Architecture, Inc. David Hill Bashford, Charlotte, for Pompano Masonry Corp.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2004 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Pompano Masonry Corp.) shall have up to and including the 12th day of January 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2004."
